alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued June 23 at 1:09PM MDT until June 24 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills, South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...Midnight Tonight through Noon Saturday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong crosswinds may create increased blow off and blow over risks for light weight and high profile vehicles. Those towing camper trailers and light load semi trucks are particularly at risk.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
